record.properties: Top = 155 Left = 502 Width = 765 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 20 Left = 10 Height = 292 Width = 114 Alias = "mr_instances" Order = "iname" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_instances" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 20 Left = 150 Height = 279 Width = 241 Alias = "mr_enum_gameversion" Order = "gverlong" OrderDirection = 2 Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_enum_gameversion" Name = "Cursor2"
Top = 20 Left = 459 Height = 363 Width = 182 Alias = "mr_mods" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_mods" Name = "Cursor3"
Top = 0 Left = 0 Height = 504 Width = 1320 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "INSTANCES" uniqueid = 601C1595B05F46FDA00D1C22A3788D5B Name = "MR_INSTANCES" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Destroy _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid)
ENDPROC PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
if seek(_inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid), 'MR_INSTANCES', 'IGUID') = .f.
go top in 'MR_INSTANCES'
endif
thisform.updateui() ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_deleteinstance *!* mr_deleteinstance
local omod
if not empty(mr_instances.iguid)
select 'mr_mods'
scatter blank name m.omod
m.omod.iguid = '00000000' m.omod.fguid = '00000000' m.omod.rguid = '0000000000000000'
scan for mr_mods.iguid = mr_instances.iguid
gather name m.omod
endscan
select 'mr_instances'
delete next 1 in 'mr_instances'
thisform.refresh()
endif ENDPROC PROCEDURE updateui *!* updateui
local icaption, sep
m.sep = space(3)
m.icaption = ' ' + ; 'GUID: ' + mr_instances.iguid + m.sep + ; 'NAME: ' + ALLTRIM(mr_instances.iname) + m.sep + ; 'VERSION ' + ALLTRIM(mr_instances.iminecraft) + m.sep + ; 'LOADER: ' + ALLTRIM(mr_instances.iloader) + m.sep + ; 'MINVER: ' + ALLTRIM(mr_instances.gver1) + m.sep + ; 'MAXVER: ' + ALLTRIM(mr_instances.gver2) + m.sep + ; 'PATH: '
m.icaption = LEFT(m.icaption + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 255 - len(m.icaption)), 255)
thisform.lblinstance.caption = m.icaption
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Height = 144 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 9 Top = 324 Width = 912 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Anchor = 15 Height = 276 Left = 12 Top = 36 Width = 1296 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange LPARAMETERS nColIndex
thisform.updateui() ENDPROC PROCEDURE DblClick do form mr_mods with mr_instances.iguid ENDPROC PROCEDURE opencontextmenu local choice, folder, onlycfmods
this.ContextMenu.clear()
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN')
mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid)
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION1', 'Open Instance Mods Tab') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', sys(2015), '-') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION2', 'Sync server folder') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION3', 'Generate server folder') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', sys(2015), '-') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION4', 'Run server start.cmd') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION5', 'Run MultimMC instance') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', sys(2015), '-') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION6', 'Generate CurseForge modpack zip') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION7', 'Generate MultiMC instance zip') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION8', 'Generate server zip') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION9', 'Generate extras zip') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', sys(2015), '-') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION9A', 'Generate all zips')
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', sys(2015), '-') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION10A', 'Open instance folder') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION10B', 'Open config folder') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION10C', 'Open mods folder') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION11', 'Open server folder') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'OPTION12', 'Open zips folder')
m.choice = this.ContextMenu.show()
do case
case m.choice = 'OPTION1'
do form mr_mods WITH mr_instances.iguid
case m.choice = 'OPTION2'
mr_syncserverfolder(mr_instances.iguid) thisform.refresh()
case m.choice = 'OPTION3'
m.onlycfmods = .f. mr_instanceupdate(mr_instances.iguid) mr_genserverfolder(mr_instances.iguid, m.onlycfmods) thisform.refresh()
case m.choice = 'OPTION4'
mr_runserver(mr_instances.isrvfolder)
case m.choice = 'OPTION5'
mr_runinstance(mr_instances.iguid)
case m.choice = 'OPTION6'
mr_instanceupdate(mr_instances.iguid)
mr_gencfmodpackzip(mr_instances.iguid)
thisform.refresh()
case m.choice = 'OPTION7'
mr_genmultimczip(mr_instances.iguid)
case m.choice = 'OPTION8'
mr_instanceupdate(mr_instances.iguid)
m.onlycfmods = .t. mr_genserverfolder(mr_instances.iguid, m.onlycfmods, addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'temp_server') mr_genserverzip(mr_instances.iguid, addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'temp_server')
thisform.refresh()
case m.choice = 'OPTION9'
mr_genextraszip(mr_instances.iguid)
case m.choice = 'OPTION9A'
mr_instanceupdate(mr_instances.iguid) mr_gencfmodpackzip(mr_instances.iguid) mr_genmultimczip(mr_instances.iguid) m.onlycfmods = .t. mr_genserverfolder(mr_instances.iguid, m.onlycfmods, addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'temp_server') mr_genserverzip(mr_instances.iguid, addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'temp_server') mr_genextraszip(mr_instances.iguid)
case m.choice = 'OPTION10A' &&INSTANCE
mr_explorerhere(justpath(mr_instances.ifolder))
case m.choice = 'OPTION10B' &&CONFIG
mr_explorerhere(justpath(mr_instances.ifolder) + '\config')
case m.choice = 'OPTION10C' &&MODS
mr_explorerhere(mr_instances.ifolder)
case m.choice = 'OPTION11'
mr_explorerhere(mr_instances.isrvfolder)
case m.choice = 'OPTION12'
mr_explorerhere(mr_instances.izipfolder)
endcase
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 12 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_add_black_18dp.png Caption = "ADD" ToolTipText = "ADD INSTANCE(S)" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand6"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local iguid
m.iguid = mr_instancegetfolder()
?m.iguid
if not empty(m.iguid)
= seek(m.iguid, 'MR_INSTANCES', 'IGUID')
endif
thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 720 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "BL" ToolTipText = "OPEN FILE BLACKLIST" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand11"
record.methods: PROCEDURE Click do form mr_blacklist with mr_instances.iguid ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 144 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_folder_black_18dp.png Caption = "FOLDER" ToolTipText = "CHANGE INSTANCE FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "_tbcommand5"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local lastfolder, selfolder
m.lastfolder = mr_instances.ifolder
m.selfolder = getdir(m.lastfolder, 'Select MultimMC folder, MultimMC instances folder, instance folder or mods folder', '', 1 + 64 + 16 + 32)
if not empty(m.selfolder) then
clear
?m.selfolder
do case
case directory(m.selfolder + '.minecraft\mods')
*!* instance folder
m.selfolder = m.selfolder + '.minecraft\mods'
case directory(m.selfolder + 'minecraft\mods')
*!* instance folder
m.selfolder = m.selfolder + 'minecraft\mods'
case directory(m.selfolder + 'mods')
*!* minecraft folder
m.selfolder = m.selfolder + 'mods'
otherwise
*!* mods folder?
m.selfolder = rtrim(m.selfolder, 1, '\')
endcase
?m.selfolder
endif
if lower(right(m.selfolder, 14)) == 'minecraft\mods'
if not lower(m.selfolder) == lower(m.lastfolder)
mr_instanceupdate(mr_instances.iguid, m.selfolder)
endif
else
messagebox('"' + m.selfolder + '" IS NOT A VALID MODS FOLDER', 0, 'MODROBOT')
endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 780 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\ic_slideshow_black_18dp.png Caption = "RUN" ToolTipText = "RUN MULTIMC INSTANCE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand17"

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 72 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_clear_black_18dp.png Caption = "DELETE" ToolTipText = "DELETE SELECTED INSTANCE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods: PROCEDURE Click thisform.mr_deleteinstance() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1032 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "GEN SERVER" ToolTipText = "GENERATE SERVER FOLDER - WILL DELETE CURRENT CONTENTS OF SERVER FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbalign = 2 tbpictureautosize = .F. Name = "tbserver"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local onlycfmods
m.onlycfmods = .f.
mr_instanceupdate(mr_instances.iguid)
mr_genserverfolder(mr_instances.iguid, m.onlycfmods)
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 312 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_folder_black_18dp.png Caption = "SF" ToolTipText = "SELECT A TARGET SERVER FOLDER TO CREATE A SERVER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbfolder"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local isrvfolder, lastfolder
If Empty(mr_instances.isrvfolder)
m.lastfolder = mr_instances.ifolder
Else
m.lastfolder = mr_instances.isrvfolder
Endif
m.isrvfolder = Getdir(m.lastfolder, 'Select target server folder for this instance', '', 1 + 64 + 16 + 32)
If Not Empty(m.isrvfolder) Then
Replace mr_instances.isrvfolder With m.isrvfolder In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.Refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 192 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_bottom_black_18dp.png Caption = "MINVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MIN MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "_tbcommand3"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
*!* Lparameters pItemID, pParentId, pItemType, pItemChecked, pItemDisabled, pItemCaption, pItemPicture
Go Top
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, mr_enum_gameversion.gver)
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver Replace mr_instances.gverlong1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong
Endif
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 252 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_top_black_18dp.png Caption = "MAXVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MAX MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "_tbcommand4"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver Replace mr_instances.gverlong2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong
Endif
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC
